item.title: Taylor Swift’s Favorite De-Stressing Technique Is Backed by a Ton of Science
item.description: Psychologists say the pop icon’s go-to trick for relaxing after a show is also an ideal way for non-megastars to wind down after a stressful day.

item.title: Here’s What Most Companies Get Wrong About AI Training
item.description: Nearly 6 out of 10 workers will need AI upskilling by 2030, but corporate training is so broken that most employees lie about using AI tools.

item.title: How Meta’s Link Limit in Facebook Posts Will Cost Small-Business Marketers
item.description: The company will charge a monthly fee for unrestricted posting on the platform.

item.title: The $10,000 Influencer Mistake
item.description: The experience that taught this entrepreneur how to evaluate “free” marketing

item.title: The New First Impression
item.description: How AI is changing the way patients search for care
